title: Kanata : The Lap Pillow Sommelier
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hanamaru-chan~, Kanata has a request for you…. Would you give Kanata a lap pillow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh? Are you okay with Maru? Should Maru get Emma-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>No, Kanata is fine with Hanamaru-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru doesn’t mind…. But Maru is not sure if Maru can do it well<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hanamaru-chan’s lap pillow…. Kanata can see a flower garden~. It’s so soft and has a nice scent…. It also cradles Kanata’s head nicely~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>D-, does that mean Maru is a bit chubby!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s not that. It means your lap has elasticity<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Elasticity….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>From Kanata’s perspective, as a lap pillow sommelier, your lap pillow ranks the best best best triple S, Hanamaru-chan~. It’s heaven on earth~.... *zzz*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, triple S…. Ehehe, Maru is so happy Zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
